author: vors
body:
https://travis-ci.org/PowerShell/PowerShell/jobs/195949401

```
A command is running to initially populate your local package cache, to improve restore speed and enable offline access. This command will take up to a minute to complete and will only happen once.

Expanding 100% 49856 ms

error:   The type initializer for 'System.Net.Http.CurlHandler' threw an exception.
error:   The type initializer for 'Http' threw an exception.
error:   The type initializer for 'HttpInitializer' threw an exception.
error:   The type initializer for 'CryptoInitializer' threw an exception.
error:   Unable to load DLL 'System.Security.Cryptography.Native.OpenSsl': The specified module could not be found.
error:    (Exception from HRESULT: 0x8007007E)
Execution of { dotnet restore $RestoreArguments } failed with exit code 1
At /Users/travis/build/PowerShell/PowerShell/build.psm1:2271 char:13
+             throw "Execution of {$sb} failed with exit code $LASTEXIT ...
+             ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : OperationStopped: (Execution of { ...ith exit co 
   de 1:String) [], RuntimeException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : Execution of { dotnet restore $RestoreArguments  
   } failed with exit code 1
```

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: I think that means that the OpenSLL binaries were not patched properly. Did the configuration recently change?

title: mac build is red on master
